File use: Associated with a specific commit in the *schema repo*; documents changes in the *schema repo* since the previous commit annotated by a *Schema changes* file
File location: Stored in the ``migrations`` directory in the *schema repo*, which is automatically created if necessary
Filename format: :obj:`schema_changes_{}_{}.yaml`, where the {} placeholders are replaced with the file's creation timestamp and the prefix of the commit's git hash, respectively

File use: Load a ``Reader`` and/or ``Writer class`` from the *schema repo* that Migration will use to read and/or write files whose data models are defined by the schema; if ``custom_io_classes.py`` does not exist or doesn't define ``Reader`` or ``Writer`` the default ``obj_model.io.Reader/Writer`` will be used
File location: Stored in the :obj:`<package name>/migrations` directory in the *schema repo*, where “<package name>” is the root directory of the python package in the *schema repo*
